distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
The strongswan package was updated to fix the following security issue:

- CVE-2015-8023: Fixed an authentication bypass vulnerability in the eap-mschapv2 plugin (bsc#953817).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

relationships.relates_to_product_reference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP1

notes.text: The server implementation of the EAP-MSCHAPv2 protocol in the eap-mschapv2 plugin in strongSwan 4.2.12 through 5.x before 5.3.4 does not properly validate local state, which allows remote attackers to bypass authentication via an empty Success message in response to an initial Challenge message.
notes.title: CVE description
